---
name: scenario
description: Start Azure demo ideation flow.
---

/scenario

**Purpose:** Start a new Azure demo scenario ideation session.

**Instructions:**  
- The Azure Ideation Agent will propose an Azure demo scenario (e.g., "Azure Migrate: Lift-and-shift from on-prem SQL to PaaS").
- Include a scenario summary, business case, intended user, and core Azure tech to showcase.
